Welcome to Innovation Policy Summer Term 2024
The first lecture takes place on April 15, 2024 (14:15 in H 3007).

The registration procedure will be explained in the first lecture. You can register for this course via the registration form below. Registration opens April 15th, 2024, and closes April 21st (11:59 pm). Confirmation emails for the course will be sent out the following day. In the past years, everyone who
registered got accepted. However, we need a list of the participants for further planning.
If you missed the registration deadline but still want to participate, please reach out via email to Charlotte (c.rochell@tu-berlin.de). Late registrations are possible.
Please note that you have to be formally accepted according to the application procedure of the course in order to be considered for grading.
All students have to register for the exam
